metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5802 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An error within the "kodak_radc_load_raw()" function(internal/dcraw_common.cpp) related to the "buf" variable in LibRawversions prior to 0.18.7 can be exploited to cause an out-of-bounds readmemory access and subsequently cause a crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5802` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1
libraw19 - 0.18.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1').
darktable package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
